Package com.toy_store.java.marketing

com.toy_store.java.marketing is a group classes that handle marketing elements, such as maintaining the store, discounts etc.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Discount
    Represents a discount that can be applied to all the products present on the store.
    Store
    Represents a Toy-Store.
    Store.SingletonHelper
    Bill Pugh Singleton implementation.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    DiscountType
    Enum that holds the type of the discount.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    DiscountNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a discount cannot be found on the store.
